tool_description: Get Pinterest board images easily with our simple API, perfect for seamless integration into your projects
name: Pinscrape
title: Pinscrape

api_list.name: get info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pinscrape.p.rapidapi.com/api/kurizutaz/sketches/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinscrape.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pinscrape.p.rapidapi.com/api/{username}/{boardname}/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinscrape.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get pins
api_list.description: Get pinterest board pins aka images from a user's board
